cosmos-desc: Cosmos is a skin designed and based off Fandom's Oasis skin. Designed to improve upon their design, and provide an efficient MediaWiki skin for non-Fandom users, or for users transitioning out of Fandom.
cosmos-createpage-dialoge-text: We currently have '''$1''' {{PLURAL:$1|article|articles}} on $2. Type your article name above or click on one of the titles below and start writing!
cosmos-mobile-preference: Enable mobile responsive version of the Cosmos skin
cosmos.css: /* All CSS here will be loaded for users of the Cosmos skin */
cosmos.js: /* All JavaScript here will be loaded for users of the Cosmos skin */
